name: Legion TD 2
description: Competitive 2v2 and 4v4 tower defense. From the team that brought you Legion TD. Made by an indie team of 4 friends.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
